statements: SELECT claim_number, claim_date, status FROM Claims;
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE claim_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT claim_number, claim_date FROM Claims WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_number, status FROM Claims WHERE status IN ('approved', 'rejected') ORDER BY claim_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE claim_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT claim_number, claim_date FROM Claims WHERE status = 'approved' ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_number FROM Claims WHERE claim_date > '2022-01-01' AND status = 'pending' ORDER BY claim_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT status FROM Claims WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE status IN ('approved', 'pending') ORDER BY claim_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM Claims;
SELECT claim_number, status, claim_date FROM Claims;
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE status='approved';
SELECT claim_number, claim_date FROM Claims WHERE claim_number = 100;
SELECT * FROM Claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE status='Pending' ORDER BY claim_date DESC
SELECT claim_number, claim_date FROM Claims WHERE status='Approved' ORDER BY claim_date ASC
SELECT status FROM Claims WHERE claim_date >= '2021-01-01' AND claim_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY status ASC
SELECT claim_number, status FROM Claims WHERE claim_number IN (1001, 1002, 1003)
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE status='Rejected' AND claim_date >= '2020-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Claims;
SELECT claim_number, status FROM Claims;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM Customers;
SELECT claim_number, document_name FROM ClaimDocuments;
SELECT claim_date, status FROM Claims;
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE status = 'Approved' ORDER BY claim_date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT c.customer_name, cd.document_name FROM Customers c JOIN ClaimDocuments cd ON c.customer_id = cd.claim_number WHERE cd.document_name LIKE '%invoice%' ORDER BY c.customer_name ASC, cd.document_name DESC;
SELECT claim_number, COUNT(*) as total_documents FROM ClaimDocuments GROUP BY claim_number HAVING total_documents > 5 ORDER BY total_documents DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT c.customer_name FROM Customers c INNER JOIN Claims cl ON c.customer_id = cl.claim_number WHERE cl.status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM Claims c LEFT JOIN Customers cust ON c.claim_number = cust.customer_id WHERE c.status = 'Denied' ORDER BY c.claim_date ASC, cust.customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM Items WHERE item_id = 3;
SELECT claim_number, status FROM Claims WHERE claim_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM Comments WHERE claim_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE status = 'Approved' ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE username LIKE 'J%';
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM Items WHERE item_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT comment_text FROM Comments WHERE comment_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND user_id = 123 ORDER BY comment_id DESC;
SELECT claim_number, claim_date, status FROM Claims INNER JOIN Comments ON Claims.claim_number = Comments.claim_id WHERE user_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM Claims;
SELECT claim_date, status FROM Claims WHERE claim_number = 12345;

SELECT c.claim_number, cd.description, cu.username FROM Claims c INNER JOIN ClaimDetails cd ON c.claim_number = cd.claim_number INNER JOIN ClaimUsers cu ON cu.user_id = cd.claim_number WHERE cu.username LIKE 'John%';
SELECT ch.claim_number, ch.status, ch.timestamp FROM ClaimHistory ch ORDER BY ch.timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT cp.claim_number, SUM(cp.amount) AS total_payments FROM ClaimPayments cp GROUP BY cp.claim_number HAVING total_payments > 5000;
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT claim_number, claim_date FROM Claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT c.claim_number, cd.description, cu.username FROM Claims c JOIN ClaimDetails cd ON c.claim_number = cd.claim_number JOIN ClaimUsers cu ON c.claim_number = cu.user_id;
SELECT ch.claim_number, ch.status, cp.amount FROM ClaimHistory ch JOIN ClaimPayments cp ON ch.claim_number = cp.claim_number WHERE ch.status = 'Approved';
SELECT cu.username, cp.amount FROM ClaimUsers cu JOIN ClaimPayments cp ON cu.user_id = cp.claim_number WHERE cp.amount > 1000;
